content: the sunday funday top crochet pattern is perfect for crocheters of all skill levels looking to create a stylish and versatile top this pattern features crochet stripes and mesh worked flat and seamed for a flattering fit with clear written instructions and a helpful captioned video tutorial everyone can enjoy making this tee available in sizes xs to 5x sunday is always fun-day when you get to show off your latest creation and its simple style means you can make it in all the colors and make it your own this sweater is crocheted top down so you can customize the fit as you go the sunday funday top is oversized with up to 8 of positive ease - for a slimmer fit go down a size prefer something longer just add more row to the bottom **unique features-** crochet stripes and mesh design top-down construction for easy customization includes written pattern and captioned right and left-handed video tutorials for guidance available in a wide range of sizes from xs to 5x pdfs include both standard font and large print editions **materials needed-** hook us-j 6 0 mm hook susan bates https //amzn to/455calh yarn bernat softee cotton https //amzn to/4mdocbf dk weight 700-1500 yards also recommended crochet stitch markers https //amzn to/4mjy7n9
